channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I haven’t seen sunlight in 3 months’: American law firm trainees in London endure 13-hour days for eye-watering six-figure starting salaries
item.description: Law firm trainees need to be ready to take calls at odd hours, weekends, and while on vacation—but they mint up to £170,000 a year doing it.

item.title: Reject the Pro-Abortion Radicalism of Missouri’s Amendment 3
item.description: A proposed constitutional amendment on the ballot is the most extreme in the country. Voters in the state should reject it.

item.title: A Harris Presidency Would Be a Disaster Abroad
item.description: When not vague or entirely mum, she has promised to continue Biden’s foreign policy. In other words, failure on an international scale.

item.title: The Media Made Sure This Election Was Never Going To Be Free Or Fair
item.description: The corrupt news media lied to voters on behalf of Democrats over and over ensuring an unfair election. How can we ever return to normal?

item.title: Hundreds of German workers on a 4-day workweek trial got better sleep, more exercise, and felt less stress than their 5-day peers
item.description: German workers gave hair samples and wore smartwatches to gauge the health benefits of a shortened working week.

item.title: Making a Morally Intolerable Choice
item.description: Voting for Trump is morally intolerable. So is doing nothing to stop Harris. Either way, I violate my conscience.

item.title: China premier says he’s ‘fully confident’ country’s sluggish economy will hit 5% growth target as stimulus grows
